text: The 1861 Napier by-election was a by-election held in the electorate during the 3rd New Zealand Parliament, on 1 July 1861. The by-election was caused by the resignation of incumbent MP Henry Stark and was won by William Colenso. Messrs Colenso, Sealy, Tucker and Ferguson were nominated, with Colenso subsequently elected with a majority of 17. ==Results== ==References== Napier 1861 Category:1861 elections in New Zealand Category:July 1861 events Category:Politics of the Hawke's Bay Region
title: 1861 Napier by-election
